title: Caramel Iced Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: ['450g margarine', '400g caster sugar', '500g pumpkin puree', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '500g plain flour', '90g unsalted butter', '125ml milk', '240g icing sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '220g dark brown soft sugar']
